document.full_text: some new york theaters have discovered that lobby concession stands can extend the life of their spaces beyond showtime and become places where patrons can sit before or after shows.
document.title: locavore lobby snacks don't wait for the curtain
lines_and_colors: some new york theaters have discovered that lobby concession stands can extend the life of their spaces beyond showtime and become places where patrons can sit before or after shows.
